roleset.name: to give warning to, frighten
roleset.note: ALARM-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from alarm.01-v)
ALARMING-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from alarming.01-j)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Some analysts at least]-1 are buying that argument , and were n't alarmed [*-1]by the losses .

example.name: transitive
example.text: It raises the long-cherished hopes of many Germans for reunification -- a prospect that [*T*-1] almost equally alarms political leaders in Moscow , Washington and Western Europe .
example.arg: political leaders in Moscow , Washington and Western Europe

example.name: "For" realization
example.text: I 'm sure that it must have been alarming for all concerned .

example.name: "To" complement, it EXP
example.text: I am an active, healthy woman, so it was alarming to me that I was going through these issues.
example.arg: that I was going trough these issues.
